Want a unique design? We will help you!

We have own methods to work with clients and make their thoughts into the concept of the future design project. Our company was working on special working methods too hard but we're glad to see big changes from scratch. Our design corresponds to the profile of the customer, contains elements of corporate symbols. We constantly conduct usability testing, audit of the target audience (CA). In order to the site to be useful to the audience, we determine the target audience of the business, its requests, preferences and interests.

To start with, we're going to find out and listen to your thoughts about preferred website (How do you see the design? What do you want to see there? etc.) Then, we ananlyse that into the concept and keep working on it by your wishes. How the page is structured, what colors were chosen, margins, how symmetry was observed, how much content was offered on the resource and what font was chosen, and many, many others...

  • Conversation about your wishes & ideas
  • Our thoughts & offers about the project
  • Сoordination of details. Making the website
  • Corrections. Changes. Posting & success
